description: |-
  Validate that a string is Base32 encoded.
---

# function: base32

Returns true when the input string can be decoded from Base32.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  values = ["NBSWY3DP", "OZQWY2LEMF2GK==="]
}

output "base32_example" {
  value = [
    for v in local.values : {
      value = v
      valid = provider::validatefx::base32(v)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
base32(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
